Child Infant Jesus Ring 

Religious enamel pendants with Madonnas and Patron Saints. We paint using ceramic pigments following traditional practices and employing the Limoges enamel technique of jewelry. Each piece is fired in a kiln at 800 Degrees Celsius. Our medals are set in 18K solid Yellow Gold Frame and set with precious and semi precious stones along with an inscription in black along the rear side. 

  • 18-karat rose gold ring 
  • Small hand painted enamel Holy Child Infant of Prague
  • Measurements 12mm wide by 16mm long  
  • Set with 0.28 ctw white diamond round
  • Set with 0.20 ctw black diamond
  • Brilliant Cut
  • Color: H-G
  • Clarity: VS1-VS2
  • Conflict free diamonds
  • Ships in 2 to 3 weeks
